content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information on Bofors' current market reach and shares. However, Bofors is a well-known and established Swedish company that specializes in the development and production of weapons systems and defense technology. Bofors has a strong presence in Sweden and other European countries, as well as in North America and Asia. In terms of market share, Bofors is a major player in the defense industry, providing weapons and munitions to militaries around the world.
